reviews.review_msg: Dr. Elliot is a very nice person. This course is easier than other upper-division courses. You will learn machine-learning techniques, methods, and even some simple deep-learning concepts. The projects are super helpful as you can apply the theoretical knowledge to practice. Overall this course is good!

Extremely caring, attentive and intelligent professor. Willing to help with any questions you might have and provide suggestions. Gives you advice beyond the scope of the course that is directly applicable towards your professional career. One of the best professors at SFU.
